Welcome to AuctionBay!
--
Here is a list of operations (what to input):
- Login (login)
- Create (create)
- Delete (delete)
- Advertise (advertise)
- Bid (bid)
- Refund (refund)
- Add Credit (addcredit)
- List All Items (listallitems)
- List All Users (listallusers)
- Reset Password (resetpassword)
- Logout (logout)

Enter operation:

Enter operation:
user01 successfully logged out.

vicks                    user01          user03                  10              10
fan                      user01          N/A                     75              75
lotion                   user01          user03                  5               5
lamp                     user02          N/A                     70              50

Enter operation:
Enter item name:
Enter seller's username:
Current Highest Bid: $10
Enter new bid amount:
Bid of $30.00 successfully placed on vicks.
vicks              user01       user03       10 30        

Enter operation:
Current credit balance for user03: $70.00
Enter the credit amount to add:
New credit balance for user03: $120.00

Enter operation:
user03 successfully logged out.

Hello user04 (SS)!

Item Name: 		 Item Seller: 	 Highest Bidder: 	 Highest Bid: 	 Auction Days Left:

fan                      user01          N/A                     75              75
lotion                   user01          user03                  5               5
lamp                     user02          N/A                     70              50

Enter operation:
Enter the item name:
Error: lamp already exists in available-items file.

Enter operation:
Enter the item name:
Enter the minimum bid ($):
Enter auction duration (in days):
phone successfully put up for auction for 21 days.
phone              user04       N/A          21 40        

Enter operation:
Current credit balance for user04: $100.00
Enter the credit amount to add:
Error: Invalid input for credit. Enter a number between 1-1000.

Enter operation:
Current credit balance for user04: $100.00
Enter the credit amount to add:
New credit balance for user04: $600.00

Enter operation:
user04 successfully logged out.

- Create (create)
- Delete (delete)
- Advertise (advertise)
- Bid (bid)
- Refund (refund)
- Add Credit (addcredit)
- List All Items (listallitems)
- List All Users (listallusers)
- Reset Password (resetpassword)
- Logout (logout)

- Reset Password (resetpassword)
- Logout (logout)

- Create (create)
- Delete (delete)
- Advertise (advertise)
- Bid (bid)
- Refund (refund)
- Add Credit (addcredit)
- List All Items (listallitems)
- List All Users (listallusers)
- Reset Password (resetpassword)
- Logout (logout)
